desc: Canvas banners, pennants and flags, designed in our Minnetonka workshop, made by hand. Creative typography, stenciled, screen printed and stamped, patches added, with metal D rings for easy hanging. Unique, colorful, retro-modern-vintage art for cabin, dorm, loft or den. Or anywhere you have, er, walls.

layout.text: at Comet Banner Works, Minnetonka, USA.
